Tender Description:
The Framework will consist of two Lots. Lot 1 - Commercial Services (CPV Values 66000000; 79200000; 79210000) Lot 2 Project Management Services including Planning & Scheduling and Risk Management (CPV Values 71313410; 71356400; 71410000; 71541000; 72224000). 
It is our intention to award a 72 month agreement. 
Please confirm your interest by sending a response to cats@highwaysengland.co.uk e-mail address. A presentation will be issued to all expressing an interest providing  further detail of the requirement. As both Lots cover a number of areas of work you may  like to consider forming a joint venture (JV) prior to the start of the tender process for this framework. In the meantime, if you have any further questions please use the e-mail address above.
The Contracting Authority intends to use an e-tendering system in this procurement exercise.
